code: import axios from"axios";import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useNavigate,useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function HomeInfo(){const[itemInfo,setItemInfo]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const params=useParams();const nav=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{doApi();},[]);const doApi=async()=>{const id=params.id;const url1="https://www.omdbapi.com/?i=".concat(id,"&apikey=5a292f28");const url2="https://www.omdbapi.com/?i=".concat(id,"&apikey=90781f94");setLoading(true);try{const{data}=await axios.get(url1);setItemInfo(data);}catch(error){console.log(error);try{const{data}=await axios.get(url2);setItemInfo(data);}catch(error2){console.log(error2);}}setLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pageBg d-flex flex-column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container text-center py-4 flex-grow-1",children:loading||!itemInfo?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Loading..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:itemInfo.Poster,className:"infoPoster mb-3",alt:itemInfo.Title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"movieTitle",children:itemInfo.Title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movieYear mt-2",children:["Runtime: ",itemInfo.Runtime,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"Rating: ",itemInfo.imdbRating,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"Genere: ",itemInfo.Genre,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"Plot: ",itemInfo.Plot]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-dark mt-3",onClick:()=>nav(-1),children:"Back to list"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("footer",{className:"topHeader text-center py-2 text-white",children:"2Monkeys.co.il 2011-2023"})]});}
